Question: This person created a very successful publicity machine which helped rocket him to stardom.
Hints: The fifteen-minute network television program, The ____ Show, began on July 1, 1952, but did not lead to a regular network series.
This person continued publicly to deny that he was homosexual and insisted that Thorson was never his lover.
This person died of pneumonia caused by AIDS on February 4, 1987, age 67, at his winter home in Palm Springs, California.
